architecture_notes.state_management: Zustand for global state, TanStack Query for server state
architecture_notes.authentication: JWT tokens stored in localStorage, validated on each API request
architecture_notes.real_time: Socket.IO for order updates, messages, and delivery tracking
architecture_notes.styling: Tailwind CSS with Shadcn/UI component library and Radix UI primitives
architecture_notes.routing: React Router v6 with protected routes and role-based access
architecture_notes.api_structure: RESTful API with Express, PostgreSQL database with comprehensive seed data
architecture_notes.validation: Zod schemas for both frontend and backend data validation
architecture_notes.database: PostgreSQL with 72 tables covering full e-commerce and marketplace functionality
